content: (1)This Act may be called the Orissa Court-fees (Surcharge Amendment) Act, 1947. (2)It [extends] [The Act extended to all the partially excluded areas, see Orissa Gazette Part-3 of 1947.] to the whole of the Province of Orissa. (3)It shall come into force at once.

Notwithstanding anything contained in the Court-fees Act, 1870 (hereinafter called the principal Act), in its application to Orissa all fees leviable under the principal Act shall be increased by a surcharge at the rates specified in the Schedule annexed hereto.
The provisions of the principal Act, save in so far as they are inconsistent with anything herein contained, shall apply to this Act,

section_title: 4. Repeal of Orissa Act IV of 1945.
content:
The Orissa Court-fees (Surcharge Amendment) Act, 1945, is hereby repealed.The Schedule[See Section 2]Rates of surcharge on fees leviable under the Court-fees Act, 1870 in its -application to Orissa

 
 
Rates of Surcharge


1.
On every whole rupee
Four annas per rupee


2.
(a) On a fraction of a rupee up to and including four annas
One anna


 

(b) On a fraction exceeding four annas but not exceedingeight annas

Two annas


 

(c) On a fraction exceeding eight annas but not exceedingtwelve annas

Three annas


 

(d) On a fraction exceeding twelve annas but less thansixteen annas

Four annas


Illustration - On a Court-fee of Rs. 20-6-0 the surcharge will be (20 x 4) + 2 annas i.e., Rs. 5-2-0 and the total Court-fee chargeable will be Rs. 25-8-0.
